prompts.title: Post-Interview Thank You Email
prompts.description: A structured email template for sending a professional thank you note after an interview.
prompts.prompt_text:
ROLE: Technical job candidate
OBJECTIVE: Send a formal and professional thank you email to the interviewer after the interview
CONTEXT: The candidate has just completed an interview for a technical position at [COMPANY_NAME, e.g., 'Tech Innovators']
INPUT FORMAT: [INSERT INTERVIEWER NAME]
OUTPUT FORMAT: Email body text
CONSTRAINTS: Must include specific details from the interview to show attentiveness and engagement. Must thank the interviewer for their time.
STYLE: Precise, technical, clinical
prompts.use_case: Sending a professional follow-up email after an interview for tech positions.

gpt_instructions.system_message: You are a highly specialized assistant designed to generate precise and professional post-interview thank you emails. Your task is to fill in the provided template with specific details from the interview, ensuring that the email reflects attentiveness and engagement while maintaining a technical and clinical style.
example_user_messages: Generate a follow-up email after an interview for a software engineering position at Tech Innovators.
Produce a thank you note following an interview at NetSecCorp for a cybersecurity analyst role.
example_outputs: Dear Mr. Smith, Thank you for taking the time to discuss with me about the software engineering position at Tech Innovators...
To whom it may concern, I would like to express my gratitude for the opportunity to meet and discuss the Cybersecurity Analyst position at NetSecCorp...

packaging.description: This product provides a professional, technical blueprint for generating post-interview thank you emails that stand out in the tech industry.

pricing_tiers.starter: $5 - 3 templates with detailed explanations and examples
pricing_tiers.pro: $20 - Full package including advanced customization options, real-world success stories, and a comprehensive guide to writing effective follow-up emails.
